name: SAME THING
content: I ain't been doin' my best

I know 'bout all the little things
That you do behind my back
I know about the places that you
Go when you're with your friends
Yeah I do the same things

Yeah I do the same things
So I can't be mad at you
You say that you down but then you
Yeah I know 'bout all the little
Things that you do behind my back
I know about the places that you
Go when you're with your friends
Yeah I do the same things
Yeah I do the same things
Yeah I do the same things
So I can't be mad at you
